articles.author: Kim Bellware
articles.title: Boy Scouts of America changes name to Scouting America in rebrand - The Washington Post
articles.description: The change comes as the scouting organization tries to move past years of turmoil, including sexual abuse allegations and a public battle with the Girl Scouts.
articles.content:
After 114 years of being known as the Boy Scouts of America, the nations largest scouting organization is changing its name to the more inclusive Scouting America.
The major rebrand, announced Tuesd… [+289 chars]
